Context: (CNN) -- A federal jury in Los Angeles on Friday found two men guilty of starting an illegal campfire that grew into a wildfire, destroying five homes and 17 other structures, according to the U.S. Attorney's office. The Colby Fire, as it was called, scorched close to 2,000 acres of foothills in Los Angeles County near Glendora.
